value_claims.claim_title: Account opening time reduced from 9 days to seconds
value_claims.claim_description: Citi Wealth reduced account opening process time from 9 days (3x industry average) to seconds using AI agents and automation technology.
value_claims.source_quote: This process would take 9 days. Now it takes seconds.
value_claims.quote_location: S2, Joseph V. Bonanno Jr. presentation
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Direct quote from Citi executive attributing process time reduction to AI implementation. S1 establishes baseline of 9 days average account opening time.

value_claims.claim_title: AI agents streamline client acquisition and onboarding
value_claims.claim_description: AI agents transform wealth management operations by automating and streamlining client acquisition and onboarding processes, reducing manual intervention.
value_claims.source_quote: AI agents can help transform operations in wealth management by streamlining client acquisition and onboarding.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Document explicitly states AI agents transform operations through streamlining client acquisition and onboarding processes.

value_claims.claim_title: Agentic AI automates CRM system management
value_claims.claim_description: AI agents automatically update CRM records with detailed notes, contact information and other data without manual intervention, reducing administrative burden.
value_claims.source_quote: Agentic AI can streamline the management of customer relationship management (CRM) systems. Agents can update CRM records with detailed notes, contact information and more, without manual intervention.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Explicitly describes AI agents performing CRM updates autonomously without manual intervention.

value_claims.claim_title: AI augmentation for high-net-worth client advisers
value_claims.claim_description: AI agents augment human advisers for high-net-worth clients, making advisers smarter and better informed in their client interactions.
value_claims.source_quote: For high-net worth clients, AI agents can be an important augmentation to the human adviser, making the latter smarter and better informed.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Document explicitly describes AI agents augmenting human advisers to enhance their capabilities and knowledge.

value_claims.claim_title: Increased advisor client-facing time from 33% to industry standard
value_claims.claim_description: Technology improvements aimed at increasing advisor client-facing time from 33% (below industry average of 58%) by reducing manual tasks and administrative burden.
value_claims.source_quote: The audit estimated that Citi advisors spend 33% of their time on client-facing activities compared to the industry average of 58%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Baseline metric showing opportunity for improvement. AI/tech modernization (including generative AI mentioned by CIO) is part of solution to increase client-facing time.

context_claims.claim_description: Citigroup's wealth division includes private bank, Citigold (mass-affluent), and Wealth at Work units, reorganized under one roof in 2021.
context_claims.source_quote: As for Citi's wealth business, its problems were compounded by a reorganization in 2021 that put three units under one roof: the private bank; Citigold, the mass-affluent arm; and Wealth at Work.

context_claims.source_quote: If you are one of my competitors, you should fear us because I am about to crush you. Full stop.
